QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Valley of the Four Winds!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Chen Stormstout in the Valley of the Four Winds.
The adventuring spirit of the Stormstouts is something that the Alliance can learn from.
Travel with the Stormstouts and discover what secrets Pandaria holds.
Glory to the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Chen Stormstout in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Chen Stormstout in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: You seem like someone who needs some excitement in their life. Excitement... and beer!
